name: 普通化學甲（二）
goals: To provide students with a solid background for in the field of chemistry.
To train students apply the chemical skills to understand the phenomenon and solve the important problems in the nature science.
3	To help students recognize new technologies and understand the detail chemistry behind them.
syllabus:
The goal is to let students acquiring fundamental concepts in the field of chemistry.

Chemistry of bonding and molecule.

13\. Bonding: General Concepts.

14\. Covalent Bonding: Orbitals.

7\. Acids and Bases.

16\. Liquids.

17\. Properties of Solutions.

19\. Transition Metals and Coordination Chemistry.

21\. Organic and Biochemical Molecules.
